data.name: unlockType/2OverviewDescription
data.value: Active combat promotes the rank of your soldier. Tactical maneuvers like capturing control points earns more XP than just killing enemies.

data.name: unlockType/1OverviewDescription
data.value: Ribbon Points are earned by performing various actions on the battlefield. The more difficult the action, the more points you get.

data.name: unlockType/NoUnlocks
data.value: There are no unlocks for the current level.

data.name: unlockType/1NoneSelected
data.value: Click on a ribbon to get detailed information on the unlocks available at each level.

data.name: unlockType/2ProgressionMessage
data.value: Congratulations Soldier!\nYou have been promoted to the rank of

data.name: unlockType/2NoneSelected
data.value: Click on a rank to get detailed information on the unlocks at each rank.

data.name: unlockType/1ProgressionMessage
data.value: For outstanding achievements on the battlefield\nWe proudly present you with the award of

data.name: unlockType/2ProgressionMessageCharacter
data.value: Congratulations %c!\nYou have been promoted to the rank of

data.name: vehicletemplate/72Desc
data.value: The M8 Greyhound is a small armored car used primarily for reconnaissance. It is fast in rough terrain and with a 37mm main gun it packs a serious punch for such a small vehicle. It is very vulnerable to landmines.

data.name: vehicletemplate/10Desc
data.value: Tiger I, the legendary answer to the impressive new tanks fielded by Russia after the initial shock of the German invasion. The dreaded 88mm main gun and the extremely thick frontal armor makes it deadly to all enemy tanks.

data.name: vehicletemplate/71Desc
data.value: The Leichter Panzerspähwagen is a light 4-wheel drive armored car equipped with a 20mm cannon that poses a real threat to enemy lightly armored vehicles. The vehicle is used by the german reconnaissance units.

data.name: vehicletemplate/12Desc
data.value: The M18 Hellcat is an American tank destroyer. It is lightly armored but extremely fast and armed with a powerful 76mm cannon. The Hellcat’s speed is used to flank the enemy hitting heavier tanks in the side or rear.

data.name: vehicletemplate/11Desc
data.value: The ‘G’ variant of the Sturmgeschütz III has been fitted with a long barrel 75mm cannon enabling it to fire armor-piercing rounds. Together with 80mm thick frontal armor this vehicle is built to stalk and destroy tanks.

data.name: vehicletemplate/13Desc
data.value: The M4A3E8, nicknamed ‘Easy Eight’ by the crew, is an upgraded version of the M4A3. With improved suspension, wider tracks, and a high velocity 76mm gun, the M4A3E8 excels in both mobility and firepower.

data.name: vehicletemplate/14Desc
data.value: The Panzer III variant J/1 has been upgraded with the long barreled 50mm KwK 39 L/60 cannon and increased frontal armor thickness of 50mm in order to counter the new Soviet T34 tank.

data.name: vehicletemplate/15Desc
data.value: The American ‘Stuart’ light tank is fast and appearing wherever it was needed earned it the respect of American troops throughout the war. It is armed with a 37mm main cannon and several .30 cal machine guns.

data.name: vehicletemplate/16Desc
data.value: The Panzerkampfwagen I is a german light tank. Originally intended only as a training tank, its twin machineguns firing 7.92mm armor piercing bullets proved effective against infantry and lightly armored vehicles.

data.name: vehicletemplate/17Desc
data.value: The Chaffee is a late-war American light tank. It is fast and with its lightweight 75mm main gun it packs a serious punch compared to other light tanks. The Chaffee is often used in harassing tactics against heavier tanks.

data.name: vehicletemplate/18Desc
data.value: The T-34-85 model 1944 is an upgunned version of the famous Soviet T-34 tank. It features a bigger turret, sloped armor and a long barrel 85mm main gun. With an experienced crew it can counter even the mighty Tiger.

data.name: vehicletemplate/1Desc
data.value: This small four-wheel drive utility vehicle is used for transportation for all infantry. It is armed with the M1919 light machinegun for defense against infantry. The vehicle is fast and reliable even in rough terrain.

data.name: vehicletemplate/20Desc
data.value: The Me 109 ‘Emil’ is one of the top aircraft designs of all time. Conceived by German engineers in 1936 and produced in many variations, this is probably the most versatile and capable fighter aircraft of the era.

data.name: vehicletemplate/21Desc
data.value: Nicknamed the ‘fork-tailed devil’ by the Germans this versatile and sturdy American fighter is a legend. The nose arrangement of the guns makes it deadlier at greater ranges when flown by skilled pilots.

data.name: vehicletemplate/22Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/23Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/28Desc
data.value: If you encounter this rare monster on the battlefield you know you are in trouble. Armed with a powerful 90mm cannon and 11cm thick frontal armor it is more than a match for enemy heavy tanks.

data.name: vehicletemplate/43Desc
data.value: The T-38 is a small Soviet scout tank. It is fast and is armed with a single 7.62mm DT machine gun and serves best in the role of infantry support.

data.name: vehicletemplate/19Desc
data.value: The ‘Samokhodnaya Ustanovka-85’ is a medium Soviet tank destroyer. Its long barreled 85mm main cannon is able to penetrate even the Tiger I at the distance of 1000 meters. It has a low profile and good mobility.

data.name: vehicletemplate/2Desc
data.value: The ‘bucket automobile’ is a light multi-role armored car. It is robust and well liked by German infantry for whom it serves as fast transportation. It is armed with a single 7.92mm MG34 machinegun for defense.

data.name: vehicletemplate/27Desc
data.value: The BA-64, also called the ‘bobik’ by it’s crew, is a small lightly armored 4x4 vehicle roughly based on the SdKfz 222 design. It is armed with a 7.62mm DT machinegun for defense and is used by the Soviet reconnaissance units.

data.name: vehicletemplate/30Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/24Desc
data.value: The Yakovlev Yak-9 is one of the best piston engine fighter aircraft fielded during ww2. It is armed with a powerful 20mm cannon and a 12.7mm machine gun mounted in the nose of the plane.

data.name: vehicletemplate/31Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/32Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/33Desc

data.name: vehicletemplate/34Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/35Desc
data.value: The 'Kleines Kettenkraftrad' was originally designed for paratroopers, but is now mainly used by infantry as it turned out to be very useful for reconnaissance patrols and transporting squads through difficult terrain..

data.name: vehicletemplate/36Desc
data.value: The Panzer IV medium tank is the most numerous German tank of the war. Originally intended as an assault gun, it was converted to engage other tanks. Variant H has been fitted with a high-velocity 75mm main gun.

data.name: vehicletemplate/37Desc
data.value: The ‘General Lee’ is an American medium tank armed with a 75mm sponson mounted main gun as well as a 37mm turret mounted gun. It requires an experienced tank crew to get the full benefit of this special tank.

data.name: vehicletemplate/38Desc
data.value: The Panzerkampfwagen II is a fast and maneuverable German light tank. It is armed with a fast-firing 20mm cannon which is extremely effective against infantry and lightly armored vehicles.

data.name: vehicletemplate/39Desc
data.value: Built on a Czech design this light tank proves more effective early in the war than Panzer I and II. The ‘E’ variant has increased frontal armor. It carries a 37.2mm Czech main cannon.

data.name: vehicletemplate/3Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/40Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/41Desc
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit.

data.name: vehicletemplate/42Desc
data.value: The Sherman forms the backbone of American armor and performs well as an all-round tank. It is fitted with a gyrostabilizer making the 75mm cannon reasonably accurate while the tank is driving.

data.name: vehicletemplate/45Desc
data.value: The M2A2 is an early American light tank. It is armed with a .50 and a .30 caliber machine gun mounted in two separate turrets. It is fast and dangerous to infantry and lightly armored vehicles.

data.name: vehicletemplate/99Desc
data.value: The R75 is an army motorcycle used for quick transportation of troops or scouting. The motorcycle can be used to get one or two soldiers behind enemy positions for a surprise attack or reconnaissance.

data.name: vehicletemplate/50Desc
data.value: Hetzer means ‘chaser’ in German and that is exactly what this small and fast tank destroyer does best. Low profile, sloped armor and a powerful 75mm cannon makes it a difficult to see, hard hitting opponent on the battlefield.

data.name: vehicletemplate/51Desc
data.value: The ‘King Tiger’ was the most potent tank of WW2. The long barreled 88mm main gun combined with superior German optics enables this beast to easily destroy any tank on the battlefield at ranges beyond 2000 meters.

data.name: vehicletemplate/5Desc
data.value: The 42WLA is an army motorcycle used for quick transportation of troops or scouting. The motorcycle can be used to get one or two soldiers behind enemy positions for a surprise attack or reconnaissance.

data.name: vehicletemplate/46Desc
data.value: The T-26 is one of the most successful Soviet light tanks and is deployed on all the Soviet fronts. It is a further development of the British Vickers Mk. E. It is armed with a 45mm cannon and a 7.62mm machine gun.

data.name: vehicletemplate/60Desc
data.value: The M3A1 is a light armored halftrack. It is armed with a single .50 cal heavy machine gun for defense against infantry. The vehicle is used to deploy infantry troops anywhere in the combat zone.

data.name: vehicletemplate/61Desc
data.value: The SdKfz 251/1 is a german armored halftrack used to deploy infantry anywhere on the battlefield. It is equipped with two light machine guns for protection against enemy soldiers and aircraft.

data.name: vehicletemplate/44Desc
data.value: The BA-64, also called the ‘bobik’ by it’s crew, is a small lightly armored 4x4 vehicle roughly based on the SdKfz 222 design. It is armed with a 7.62mm DT machinegun for defense and is used by the Soviet reconnaissance units.

data.name: vehicletemplate/47Desc
data.value: The BA-6 is a heavily armed Soviet six-wheeled armored scout car. It uses the same turret as the T-26 light tank. It is armed with a 45mm cannon and a 7.62mm DT machine gun for defense.

data.name: vehicletemplate/48Desc
data.value: The Soviet T-70 is a very well armored light tank. It is protected in some parts by 60mm thick sloped armor making it hard to destroy for enemy light tanks. It is armed with a 45mm cannon and a 7.62mm machine gun.

data.name: vehicletemplate/49Desc
data.value: The Gorkiy Auto Zavod-AAA M-4 Maxim AA truck is a Russian tri-axial truck mounted with a quad Maxim M-4 Anti-Aircraft gun. Although the M-4 is designed for use against low flying aircraft it is also an excellent infantry support vehicle.

data.name: vehicletemplate/6Desc
data.value: The Soviet ‘Josef Stalin’ heavy tank is a direct response to the German heavy tanks. Its thick 120mm armor and massive 122mm main gun make it a deadly opponent to any tank on the battlefield.

data.name: vehicletemplate/100Desc
data.value: The M72 is a Soviet copy of the popular German R71 motorcycle used for quick transportation of troops or scouting. The motorcycle can be used to get one or two soldiers behind enemy positions for a surprise attack or reconnaissance.

data.name: vehicletemplate/8Desc
data.value: The BT-7, or ‘Betka’ as it is called by its crew, is a lightly armored Soviet cavalry tank. It is well armed with a 45mm cannon and a 7.62mm machine gun. It is also the predecessor to the famous T-34.

data.name: vehicletemplate/101Desc
data.value: The M72 and sidecar combination will greatly improve the passenger capacity and fighting capability of the motorcycle. The sidecar can further be upgraded with a machine gun for increased firepower.

data.name: vehicletemplate/52Desc
data.value: The final version of the German Panzer II, nicknamed ‘Luchs’, is better armored, faster and more maneuverable than the original light tank. It is excellent for reconnaissance and use against light tanks and infantry.

data.name: vehicletemplate/9Desc
data.value: The T-34 is by many considered to be the finest tank of the 2nd world war. It’s 12 cylinder diesel engine, the 45mm sloped armor and the 76.2mm cannon is a deadly combination on the battlefield.

data.name: vehicletemplate/53Desc
data.value: The SdKfz 7/1 is a German halftrack fitted with a 20mm Flakvierling 38 quadruple anti-aircraft autocannon system. This weapon is highly effective against low flying aircraft and lightly armored vehicles.

data.name: vehicletemplate/98Desc
data.value: The 42WLA combined with an LS29 sidecar will greatly improve the passenger capacity and fighting capability of the motorcycle. The sidecar can further be upgraded with a machine gun for increased firepower.

data.name: vehicletemplate/54Desc
data.value: The M16 MGMC (Multiple Gun Motor Carriage) is an American self-propelled anti-aircraft gun. It is nicknamed ‘The Meat Chopper’ or ‘Krautmower’ by the soldiers because of its powerful quad mounted .50 cal heavy machine guns.

data.name: vehicletemplate/4Desc
data.value: The R75 and sidecar combination will greatly improve the passenger capacity and fighting capability of the motorcycle. The sidecar can further be upgraded with a machine gun for increased firepower.

data.name: vehicletemplate/7Desc
data.value: The GAZ-67 is a general purpose four-wheel drive vehicle used by the Soviet military. It’s main design has been copied from the American Willys ‘JEEP’. It serves the important role of immediate troop transportation.

data.name: vehicletemplate/55Desc
data.value: This small and fast tracked vehicle was originally designed for commando operations in the snow filled mountains of Norway, but the Weasel quickly became a preferred transportation for U.S. troops in any theater across any terrain.

data.name: vehicletemplate/56Desc
data.value: The Panther was created as a direct response to the threat from the Soviet T-34. It is protected with 80mm sloped frontal armor and armed with the long powerful 75mm KwK 42 L/70 cannon.

data.name: vehicletemplate/57Desc
data.value: The T-20 is a small and versatile tractor. Originally designed for towing artillery pieces, it is well liked and often used by infantry for transportation to the front line. It is lightly armored and armed with a light machine gun for protection.

data.name: vehicletemplate/58Desc
data.value: The U.S. tank destroyer doctrine dictates mobility and firepower at the cost of armor protection. The M10 is armed with a hefty 76.2mm cannon and will pose a real threat to enemy tanks. It is known as the ‘Wolverine’ to the British, and simply as ‘TD’ to U.S. soldiers.

data.name: vehicletemplate/59Desc
data.value: This robust and reliable tri-axle Soviet truck has many roles on the battlefield. The vehicle is used to quickly deploy troops anywhere on the battlefield. Because it is unprotected, it should not be taken too close to the enemy.

data.name: vehicletemplate/64Desc
data.value: The backbone of the German infantry is a truck that can quickly move troops and equipment, and deploy them anywhere on the battlefield. Because it is unprotected, it should not be taken too close to the enemy.

data.name: vehicletemplate/63Desc
data.value: Faced with the threat of the mighty Panther, the Soviets have decided to field the KV-85 as a stopgap until heavier IS tanks become available. The KV-85 is comparable to the Tiger I but is much cheaper to produce and easier to repair.

data.name: vehicletemplate/66Desc
data.value: The ‘Deuce and a Half’ or ‘Jimmy’ as the soldiers call this truck, forms the backbone of the U.S. Army. This vehicle is used to quickly deploy troops anywhere on the battlefield. Because it is unprotected, it should not be taken too close to the enemy.

data.name: vehicletemplate/65Desc
data.value: The SU-76M, or ‘suka’ (meaning ‘bitch’) as it is called by its crew, is the first successful Soviet tank destroyer. Inspired by the success of the German StuG it has become a symbol of Soviet victory on the eastern front.

data.name: vehicletemplate/67Desc
data.value: This early Soviet tank is one of the first tanks to feature a multi-turret design. It proves a serious threat on the battlefield when manned by a skilled crew. The T-28 is a very sturdy tank that is cheap and easy to repair.

data.name: vehicletemplate/69Desc
data.value: The German Schwimmwagen is a light amphibious car, highly maneuverable and capable of crossing rivers and lakes for deep flanking maneuvers. It is especially suited for dealing with the marshy terrain of eastern Europe.

data.name: vehicletemplate/68Desc
data.value: In order to counter the formidable German tanks until the M26 Pershing becomes available, this Sherman has been heavily modified. The Jumbo’s 178mm frontal glacis is able to resist a direct hit from the Tiger, but the added weight comes at the cost of maneuverability.

data.name: vehicletemplate/70Desc
data.value: The QMC-4, also known as the GPA ‘Seep’, is a light amphibious car based on the popular Willys Jeep. It is popular among troops for its ability to ferry soldiers across rivers for daring flanking tactics.

data.name: vehicletemplate/75Desc
data.value: This cheap and light aircraft is an effective German reconnaissance aircraft. Do not be fooled by the low speed of this plane. An experienced 2-man crew manning the forward and rear facing machine guns can pose a real threat.

data.name: vehicletemplate/95Desc
data.value: The M20 is a small six-wheeled lightly armored vehicle designed for rapid movement in rough terrain. It is armed with a single .50 cal machine gun for defense against ground troops and aircraft.

data.name: vehicletemplate/96Desc
data.value: The Sonderkraftfahrzeug 250/3, is a small armored halftrack. It is lightly armored and armed with a single MG34 for defense. The vehicle is used by the German reconnaissance units as it moves easily through difficult terrain.

data.name: vehicletemplate/76Desc
data.value: The R-Z is a light reconnaissance aircraft of the Soviet air force. It is cheap and easy to maintain and its forward and rear facing machine guns still poses a threat in combat if manned by a skilled crew.

data.name: vehicletemplate/77Desc
data.value: The ‘Owl’ is a rather heavy American observation aircraft. It is armed with both forward and rear facing machine guns for defense. If manned by a skilled two man crew it can pose a real threat to more advanced enemy fighters.

data.name: vehicletemplate/78Desc
data.value: The Warhawk is a low altitude pursuit fighter. It has one of the fastest dive speeds of the early war planes. Equipped with an arrangement of six .50cal heavy machine guns it is a deadly foe in the hands of a trained pilot.

data.name: vehicletemplate/79Desc
data.value: The Pe-3 is a Soviet long range heavy fighter. Its armament consists of a 20mm cannon in the nose, two 12.7mm heavy machine guns under the fuselage, a 7.62mm fixed tail gun, and a dorsal turret with a 12.7mm heavy machine gun.

data.name: vehicletemplate/80Desc
data.value: The Me 410 is a German heavy fighter. It features two 20mm cannons and two 13mm heavy machine guns in the nose for attack and two rear facing 13mm heavy machine guns fitted in remote controlled blister mounts on each side for defense against trailing enemies.

data.name: vehicletemplate/92Desc
data.value: The Mustang is the pinnacle of U.S. fighter aircraft. It is armed with six .50 cal machine guns, sacrificing firepower for speed. Enemy pilots find it difficult to meet in combat because of its high speed and maneuverability.

data.name: vehicletemplate/83Desc
data.value: The MiG-3 is a high altitude interceptor. It is armed with one 12.7mm and two 7.62mm machine guns. Despite its below average maneuverability, its high speed means it can outrun any other aircraft.

data.name: vehicletemplate/84Desc
data.value: The P-35 is the first all-metal fighter featuring a retractable landing gear adopted by the U.S. The P-35A is armed with two .50 caliber machine guns above the engine and backed up by two wing mounted .30 caliber guns.

data.name: vehicletemplate/90Desc
data.value: Introduced in 1944, the SU-100 is a significant upgrade to its predecessor, the SU-85. With almost twice the frontal armor thickness and armed with the powerful 100mm D-10S High Velocity gun, this vehicle can take on any foe.

data.name: vehicletemplate/85Desc
data.value: Armed with a 20mm cannon firing through the propeller hub and two 7.92mm machineguns the Bf 109D-1 is formidable against early war aircraft. What it lacks in engine power it more than makes up for in firepower.

data.name: vehicletemplate/88Desc
data.value: Combining the mobility of the M10 Tank Destroyer with the firepower of the M26 Pershing, the M36 is the fastest way to bring a 90mm gun to where you need it. Full turret rotation ensures versatility. The M36 is also known by the nicknames ’Jackson’ or ’Slugger’.

data.name: vehicletemplate/89Desc
data.value: The Jagdpanther packs the powerful 88mm PaK 43/3 L/71 gun into the chassis of the Panther tank. Being able to turn on the spot, this Tank Destroyer not only excels in maneuverability and firepower, but also incorporates a very respectable frontal armor.

data.name: vehicletemplate/87Desc
data.value: The M36B1 takes the turret and 90mm Gun of the M36 and combines it with the heavy armored hull of an M4 Sherman. A good combination of firepower and armor with only a minor reduction in mobility.

data.name: vehicletemplate/86Desc
data.value: This fast and maneuverable Soviet fighter is a close match for the German Bf 109 and Fw-190 in combat. Armed with three of the new 20 mm Berezin cannons the firepower of the La-7 is feared by enemy pilots.

data.name: vehicletemplate/91Desc
data.value: The german SdKfz 234/2 is a fast, lightly armored, reconnaissance vehicle. The 8-wheel steering makes it highly maneuverable and the 50mm KwK 39 cannon can deal with everything enemy infantry can throw at it.

data.name: vehicletemplate/93Desc
data.value: ‘Long-Nose Dora’ is considered by many to be the finest piston-engine fighter in the war. It uses a liquid cooled 12-cylinder bomber engine and a balanced armament of two 20 mm auto-cannons and two 13 mm machine guns.

data.name: vehicletemplate/94Desc
data.value: The T8E1 Stuart Recce is a turretless variant of the M5 Stuart light tank specifically created for recon missions. It provides excellent protection for its crew and the .50cal machine gun provides adequate protection against infantry.

data.name: vehicletemplate/97Desc
data.value: The BA-11 is a Soviet armored car used for reconnaissance and scouting missions. It is armed with a powerful 45mm cannon for attacking enemy infantry and lightly armored vehicles.

data.name: vehicletemplate/vehiclevarianttype/0Desc
data.value: Getting your hands on a few buckets of paint and a bribe for your officer allows you to repaint your vehicle. Some paint schemes will give you a better chance of hiding in certain areas of the battlefield, others will simply add a distinct look.

data.name: vehicleupgradetemplate/3Desc
data.value: Vehicles are vulnerable without the close protection of infantry. Adding a supply crate filled with ammunition to your vehicle will keep infantry near for your protection.

data.name: vehicleupgradetemplate/1Desc
data.value: Vehicles are vulnerable without the close protection of infantry. Adding a supply crate filled with medic packs to your vehicle will keep infantry near for your protection.

data.name: vehicleupgradetemplate/11Desc
data.value: Mounting a smoke tank to your plane will allow you to give signals to friendly forces.

data.name: vehicleupgradetemplate/2Desc
data.value: Sometimes nearby infantry lack anti-tank weapons or your vehicle is not sufficiently armed against heavier tanks. In that case a supply crate filled with anti-tank weapons is a life saver.

data.name: vehicleupgradetemplate/19Desc
data.value: A camouflage net covering your vehicle will soften its silhouette and make it blend into the surroundings.

data.name: vehicleupgradetemplate/18Desc
data.value: A camouflage net covering your vehicle will soften its silhouette and make it blend into the surroundings.

data.name: vehicleupgradetemplate/6Desc
data.value: Vehicles are great for transportation, but sometimes they also need some firepower. By mounting a pedestal to the vehicle you now have room for a support gunner armed with a PM M1910/30.

data.value: Vehicles are great for transportation, but sometimes they also need some firepower. By mounting a pedestal to the vehicle you now have room for a support gunner armed with a fast firing MG42.

data.name: WarBonds/GeneralWindow/warbondsDescription2
data.value: When you buy any War bond you receive interest as free Credits each month, for 6 months.\nThe amount you receive is based on a percentage of the Face Value of the bond.\nAfter 6 months, the bond expires and you get the Face Value of the bond back.

data.name: WarBonds/GeneralWindow/warbondsDescription1
data.value: Buy War bonds to invest your Credits in the war and get FREE CREDITS back!

data.name: WarBonds/GeneralWindow/support
data.value: SUPPORT THE WAR BY BUYING WAR BONDS!

data.name: WarIsOverScreen/description_new_war

data.name: WarIsOverScreen/victory_status_effect_3_desc

data.name: weaponmodcategory/UnlockDetailsDescription
data.value: With this skill the soldier will be able to use upgraded %s in his %s.\nThere are several kinds of upgraded %s on the market, some improve stopping power but sacrifice precision, others increase the range of the shot but might make the weapon more unstable.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/101Desc
data.value: The Unertl 8X scope has been chosen by the U.S. Marine Corps as the best field condition sniper scope with kills at 1000 yards reported. It uses a 8x zoom and a 'T-Post' reticle. This scope is only issued to recon soldiers.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/86Desc
data.value: This heavy steel spring will make your machinegun much more stable by reducing recoil. The better stability comes at the cost of reduced rate of fire. Great for the machinegunner that relies on accuracy instead of firepower.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/95Desc_old
data.value: The heavy bolt will increase rate of fire with a small penalty on precision.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/102Desc
data.value: The Unertl 8X scope has been chosen by the U.S. Marine Corps as the best field condition sniper scope with kills at 1000 yards reported. It uses a 8x zoom and a 'German#1' reticle. This scope is only issued to recon soldiers.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/84Desc
data.value: This barrel has been chrome lined to make it more resistant to wear and tear increasing its lifespan. This treatment produces more range for the machinegun without any other noticeable effects.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/83Desc
data.value: This barrel is made out of very hard stainless steel making is very robust compared to the standard carbon steel army barrel. Furthermore it will increase the precision of the shot.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/103Desc
data.value: The Unertl 8X scope has been chosen by the U.S. Marine Corps as the best field condition sniper scope with kills at 1000 yards reported. It uses a 8x zoom and a 'Fine Cross' reticle. This scope is only issued to recon soldiers.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/5Desc
data.value: Softening the tip of the projectile will produce a dangerous expanding bullet that will cause severe damage when hit. This comes at the cost of both precision and range.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/104Desc
data.value: The Unertl 8X scope has been chosen by the U.S. Marine Corps as the best field condition sniper scope with kills at 1000 yards reported. It uses a 8x zoom and a 'German#4' reticle. This scope is only issued to recon soldiers.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/105Desc
data.value: The Unertl 8X scope has been chosen by the U.S. Marine Corps as the best field condition sniper scope with kills at 1000 yards reported. It uses a 8x zoom and a 'Fine Duplex' reticle. This scope is only issued to recon soldiers.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/91Desc
data.value: The ZF-4 is the standard German scope. It is copy of the Soviet PU scope and designed for mass production. The scope features a 4x zoom and is fitted with a T-Post reticle. It is available for most German rifles.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/116Desc
data.value: The PU scope is the standard scope issued to Red Army marksmen. It is compact and very sturdy making it a great universal scope for infantry and recon alike.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/4Desc
data.value: The combination of slow burning gun powder and high quality copper used for the projectile give this bullet its high precision at minimum cost of range.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/3Desc
data.value: Fastburning nitroguandine charge produces a faster rate of fire at the expense of precision and recoil. The increased bullet velocity also produces slightly increased damage.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/106Desc
data.value: The ZF-41 is a German scope designed for designated marksmen. It can be mounted on top of the rear sight of most German rifles. The low magnification and compact size allows the soldier to retain situational awareness while aiming.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/96Desc
data.value: The M73B1 is the standard US Army telescope issued to designated marksmen. It can be mounted on most US rifles. It’s low magnification and small diameter allows the soldier to retain situational awareness while aiming.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/111Desc
data.value: The ZS Zielacht is a German high power sniper scope issued only to recon soldiers although there are reports of this scope being used by Soviet snipers too. It uses a 8x zoom and is fitted with a 'T-Post' reticle.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/107Desc
data.value: The ZF-39 is a German scope designated for snipers and issued in the beginning of the war. The scope features a 4.2x zoom and is fitted with a 'German#1' reticle.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/108Desc
data.value: The ZF-39 is a German scope designated for snipers and issued in the beginning of the war. The scope features a 4.2x zoom and is fitted with a 'Fine Cross' reticle. This scope is only issued to recon soldiers.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/109Desc
data.value: The ZF-39 is a German scope designated for snipers and issued in the beginning of the war. The scope features a 4.2x zoom and is fitted with a 'German#4' reticle. This scope is only issued to recon soldiers.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/110Desc
data.value: The ZF-39 is a German scope designated for snipers and issued in the beginning of the war. The scope features a 4.2x zoom and is fitted with a 'Fine Duplex' reticle. This scope is only issued to recon soldiers.

data.value: The ZS Zielacht is a German high power sniper scope issued only to recon soldiers although there are reports of this scope being used by Soviet snipers too. It uses a 8x zoom and is fitted with a 'German#1' reticle.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/117Desc
data.value: The PE-31 scope is an advanced scope issued to Red Army snipers. The scope is a complex design consisting of nine lenses. The scope uses a 4x zoom and is fitted with a 'German#1' reticle.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/20Desc
data.value: By loosening the trigger mechanism the trigger pull is lightened making it easier to fire the handgun resulting in a higher rate of fire. The downside is a minor loss of stability.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/122Desc
data.value: The ZF-41 is a German scope designed for designated marksmen. It can be mounted on top of the rear sight of most German rifles. The low magnification and compact size allows the soldier to retain situational awareness while aiming.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/21Desc
data.value: The hair trigger has a very tight trigger pull with almost no creep. This produces a much faster rate of fire but at the cost of stability.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/121Desc
data.value: The M73B1 is the standard US Army telescope issued to designated marksmen. It can be mounted on most US rifles. It’s low magnification and small diameter allows the soldier to retain situational awareness while aiming.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/24Desc
data.value: This light bolt has a reduced diameter to reduce the friction increasing reload speed. Because the gas sealing is also weakened the range is reduced. An upgrade preferred by soldiers that relies on fast shooting at shorter ranges.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/22Desc
data.value: This light spring has been loosened to increase the rate of fire. The higher firing rate will make the rifle more unstable from the increased recoil. This upgrade is perfect for the soldier who relies on fast shooting.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/23Desc
data.value: Several adjustments to the trigger mechanism is done to lighten the pull making it a very fast trigger pull resulting in a much higher rate of fire. The downside is a loss of precision.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/25Desc
data.value: The heavy bolt has far better gas sealing in the breech which diverts more energy to the bullet resulting in longer range. The downside is a longer reload time caused by the tight fitting of the internal parts.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/26Desc
data.value: This light spring has been loosened to increase the rate of fire. The higher firing rate will make the pistol more unstable from the increased recoil. This upgrade is perfect for the soldier who relies on fast shooting.

data.value: This barrel is made of chromium molybdenum alloy steel. This commercial barrel produces more range at the cost of stability. This special steel makes it less resistant to wear and tear giving it a shorter lifespan.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/76Desc
data.value: The fine hair trigger have a very tight trigger pull with almost no creep. This produces a much faster rate of fire but at the cost of precision.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/80Desc
data.value: The Octagon is a commercial stainless steel rifle barrel with a polygonal rifling. The barrel produces longer range and better precision than the standard barrel. Using custom barrels is not allowed by the army but some veterans get away with it.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/81Desc
data.value: This barrel is made of chromium molybdenum alloy steel grade 4150. Fitting this barrel to your rifle will increase range and precision. The barrel will produce more recoil from the increased pressure making the rifle less stable.

data.value: The ZF-4 is the standard German scope. It is copy of the Soviet PU scope and designed for mass production. The scope features a 4x zoom and is fitted with a 'German#1' reticle. It is available for most German rifles.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/58Desc
data.value: The M84 is the standard US Army sniper scope issued to reconnaissance units. It uses a 2.75x zoom that gives a field of view of 27 feet at 100 yards. The scope is available for most U.S. rifles and is fitted with a 'German#1' reticle.

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/Tracer/5Title
data.value: Green Tracer for all Soviet weapons - Ratio 1:1

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/Tracer/1Title
data.value: Orange Tracer for automatic weapons - Ratio 1:5

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/Tracer/4Title
data.value: Yellow Tracer for all German weapons - Ratio 1:1

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/Tracer/3Title
data.value: Red Tracer for all US weapons - Ratio 1:1

data.name: weaponmodifiertemplate/Tracer/2Title
data.value: Ranging Tracer for automatic weapons - Ratio 1:5

data.name: weaponmodtype/4UnlockMessage
data.value: Excellent Soldier!\nYour skills with weapons now enable you to upgrade the sight on %s.

data.value: Excellent %c!\nYour skills with weapons now enable you to upgrade the trigger on %s.

data.value: Excellent %c!\nYour skills with weapons now enable you to upgrade the sight on %s.

data.name: weaponmodtype/3UnlockMessageCharacter
data.value: Excellent %c!\nYour skills with weapons now enable you to upgrade the internal mechanics on %s.

data.value: Excellent %c!\nYour skills with weapons now enable you to upgrade the barrel on %s.

data.name: weaponmodtype/1UnlockMessageCharacter
data.value: Excellent %c!\nYour skills with weapons now enable you to use special ammunition with %s.

data.name: weapontemplate/12Desc
data.value: The Mosin Nagant 1891-30 is the standard bolt-action rifle issued to the Red Army. It uses a clip of 5 7.62x54mmR rounds. It has a slightly more complex design than the German K98 but has very similar performance.

data.name: weapontemplate/20Desc
data.value: The 1911 Pistol is a well proven, effective and hard hitting handgun. With 8 shots in the magazine, fixed sights and a solid construction, it is just the tool to help you get out of a tricky situation.

data.name: weapontemplate/157Desc
data.value: The RGD-33 Bundle is an improvised large explosive device. Five grenades are strapped together for increased explosive power, but the added weight makes it more difficult to throw.

data.name: weapontemplate/155Desc
data.value: The RG-42 is an offensive grenade. The design is simple but effective. It contains 200g of TNT in a metal casing. It creates a powerful concentrated blast that takes out your target while keeping nearby allies safe.

data.name: weapontemplate/156Desc
data.value: The M24 Bundle is an improvised large explosive device. By strapping six additional charges around the M24, the explosive power of the grenade is significantly increased. The added weight makes it more difficult to throw, however.

data.name: weapontemplate/158Desc
data.value: The Infantry Demolition Kit M1 is a large explosive device. While intended to be used for demolition work, 10 pounds of TNT in a satchel can be quite effective as a weapon when thrown at the enemy.

data.name: weapontemplate/154Desc
data.value: The Mk IIIA1 is an offensive hand grenade. It contains 7 ounces of TNT filler in a laminated cardboard body to create a powerful, concentrated deadly blast on target without fragmentation that could injure the thrower or nearby allies.

data.name: weapontemplate/13Desc
data.value: Fitting a scope to the excellent Mosin Nagant bolt-action rifle converts it to one of the worlds most effective sniper rifles. A precise weapon that holds 5 rounds in the internal magazine.

data.name: weapontemplate/55Desc
data.value: The standard AVS-36 bayonet is an excellent close combat weapon. Its long blade will punch through even the thickest of enemy uniforms.

data.name: weapontemplate/14Desc
data.value: The SVT-40 is a Soviet semi-automatic rifle. It is a big improvement from the older SVT-38. It fires the hard-hitting 7.62x54mmR ammunition also found in most soviet rifles and machineguns.

data.name: weapontemplate/15Desc
data.value: The RGD-33 is a defensive grenade. It contains 85g of TNT in a multilayered metal casing with an additional fragmentation sleeve for extra anti-personnel effect. Effective against personnel in open areas.

data.name: weapontemplate/136Desc
data.value: The Granatbüchse-39 is a grenade launching rifle converted from the Panzerbüchse-39 to enable the weapon to engage even heavy tanks. It uses a 7.92x94mm cartridge with a wooden bullet to launch a muzzle-loaded anti-tank grenade.

data.name: weapontemplate/137Desc
data.value: The Ampulomet is a 125mm grenade launcher introduced in 1941 to give the infantry a weapon to fight tanks. It uses a special 12 gauge shotgun cartridge to launch a FBM-125 anti-tank grenade easily capable of penetrating 90mm of armor.

data.name: weapontemplate/45Desc
data.value: The M1918 Automatic rifle is an American light machine gun used by the infantry. It uses an easily exchangeable magazine and has a high rate of fire. It is best used from a prone position.

data.name: weapontemplate/135Desc
data.value: The Panzerbüchse-39 is a German Anti-Tank rifle that fires the very unusual 7.92x94mm cartridge which uses a large gunpowder charge to shoot a small bullet at extremely high velocity capable of punching through lightly armored vehicles.

data.name: weapontemplate/16Desc
data.value: The M1 Carbine is a semi-automatic carbine. Originally intended to be a compact defensive weapon for rear echelon troops, the light weight of the M1 Carbine has made it very popular amongst front line troops.

data.name: weapontemplate/134Desc
data.value: The M9A1 is an improvement over the M1A1 bazooka. The new adjustable sights increase the accuracy and effective range of the launcher and the new M6A3 rockets have better flight stability and improved armor penetration.

data.name: weapontemplate/139Desc
data.value: The M18 is a U.S. shoulder fired anti-tank recoilless rifle. It uses a breech loaded artillery shell that is much more precise than the rockets used by the Bazooka. As the name indicates, the M18 has almost no recoil.

data.name: weapontemplate/32Desc
data.value: The Thompson M1A1 (or Tommy gun as it is sometimes known) is a fully-automatic submachine gun used by the US Armed Forces. It fires a powerful .45 caliber round and is a very effective weapon at close to medium ranges.

data.name: weapontemplate/143Desc
data.value: The steel armor plate protects its wearer against the first 30 points of damage. When worn out it can be resupplied at any ammunition crate on the battlefield.

data.name: weapontemplate/82Desc
data.value: The Tellermine is a large heavy Anti-Tank mine, when a vehicle drives over it and applies pressure to the mine it detonates, normally destroying the vehicle in the process.

data.name: weapontemplate/18Desc
data.value: The TM-35 is a square metal cased Soviet anti-tank mine. When a vehicle drives over it and applies sufficient pressure, the main charge of several 200g blocks of TNT detonates usually destroying the vehicle.

data.name: weapontemplate/11Desc
data.value: The Stielhandgranate M24 is an offensive grenade. It contains 170g of TNT in a thin metal casing attached to a wooden stick. It creates a powerful concentrated blast while producing a minimum amount of fragmentation.

data.name: weapontemplate/stenmkii
data.value: stenmkii Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec ut turpis vitae tellus vehicula pulvinar malesuada non orci. Vestibulum diam justo, tempus quis varius vitae, feugiat id leo. Praesent vel justo elementum eros aliquam porta et in libero. Praesent commodo consequat posuere. data.name: weapontemplate/42Desc
data.value: By mounting a Unertl 8x scope on the bolt-action M1903 the US Army gained a precise and effective sniper rifle. It is a precise weapon that holds 5 rounds in the internal magazine.

data.name: weapontemplate/46Desc
data.value: The M1903 is a sturdy bolt-action rifle, it loads with a 5 round stripper clip and while not super fast-firing, it is precise and hard-hitting.

data.name: weapontemplate/19Desc
data.value: The fragmentation sleeve converts the M24 into a defensive grenade. The sleeve is clipped in place over the head of the grenade causing fragmentation over a large area. Effective against personnel in open areas.

data.name: weapontemplate/80Desc
data.value: The S-mine is a German anti-personnel mine. When triggered the mine launches into the air and detonates. The explosion projects a lethal spray of steel balls and fragments in all directions.

data.name: weapontemplate/2Desc
data.value: Also known as the bayonet/fighting knife 98k, no matter what you call it, it is an effective fighting knife as well as a tool knife. If you can get close enough to your target it is a silent and effective killer.

data.name: weapontemplate/4Desc
data.value: A sturdy shovel that is very useful for a wide range of jobs, from filling sandbags over digging trenches to using it as a close-combat weapon; splitting heads and bringing hurt to the enemy.

data.name: weapontemplate/51Desc
data.value: The Panzerfaust 60 is a German single-use Anti-Tank weapon. It is a recoilless gun that fires a hard-hitting projectile capable of penetrating close to 200 mm of armor plating.

data.name: weapontemplate/17Desc
data.value: One of the most common Soviet land mines is known as the PMK-40. Employed in AT fields, ditches, and trails, it effectively causes severe injuries to personnel.

data.name: weapontemplate/85Desc
data.value: Commonly known as the 'sticky bomb' is a British anti-tank grenade used by the American forces. Throw it and it sticks to things, then it explodes. Often destroying the thing it is stuck to.

data.name: weapontemplate/31Desc
data.value: The MP40 (or Maschinenpistole 40 as it is also known) is a fully-automatic submachine gun used by the German army. It fires a 9mm round giving it a controllable recoil and is a very effective weapon at close to medium ranges.

data.name: weapontemplate/10Desc
data.value: The Mk II is a fragmentation grenade. It holds 1.8 ounces of TNT in a cast iron body. The grenade produces fragmentation that covers a large area. Effective against personnel in open areas.

data.name: weapontemplate/21Desc
data.value: The C96 is the world's first effective semi-automatic handgun. When kept clean and well-oiled it is an effective handgun with a very good effective range.

data.name: weapontemplate/61Desc
data.value: The MG42 is the latest light machine gun of the German Army. With its very high rate of fire it is feared by infantry facing it. The high rate of fire also makes it hard to control, which is why it is mainly used from the prone position.

data.name: weapontemplate/159Desc
data.value: The Machine Carbine Mk I is an Australian submachine gun. Despite its highly unconventional and bulky design it is renowned for being extremely reliable, and is regarded to be one of the best submachine guns ever created.

data.name: weapontemplate/60Desc
data.value: M2HB Heavy Machine Gun A very well-designed heavy machine gun extensively used by the US Armed Forces. Hard hitting and with a long range it is effective even against lightly armored vehicles.

data.name: weapontemplate/81Desc
data.value: The M2A3 mine is an American anti-personnel mine. When triggered the mine launches into the air and detonates. The explosion projects a lethal spray of steel balls and fragments in all directions.

data.name: weapontemplate/40Desc
data.value: The standard weapon of the US Army. A hard-hitting effective semi-automatic rifle, that uses an 8 round ‘en-bloc’ clip.

data.name: weapontemplate/144Desc
data.value: Designed to be used in tanks and armored vehicles, the DT-29 uses a compact high capacity drum magazine. The gun is fitted with a bipod for dismounted use and is popular amongst infantry who need more firepower than the DP-28.

data.name: weapontemplate/52Desc
data.value: The M1A1 Bazooka is an Anti-Tank Rocket Launcher. It is fired from the shoulder and is an effective weapon against enemy tanks.

data.name: weapontemplate/83Desc
data.value: The M1A1 is a circular steel cased U.S. anti-tank mines recognizable by its distinctive cross shaped pressure spider.

data.name: weapontemplate/62Desc
data.value: The M1919A6 is a belt-fed light machine gun used extensively by the US Armed Forces. Its high rate of fire makes it very effective at suppressing enemy troops and well placed machine gun positions can halt an entire infantry attack.

data.name: weapontemplate/3Desc
data.value: A sturdy shovel that is very useful for a wide range of jobs, from filling sandbags over digging trenches to using it as a close-combat weapon; splitting heads and bringing hurt to the enemy.

data.name: weapontemplate/145Desc
data.value: Even though this beast of a ‘light’ machine gun is old it is still very relevant in the Soviet army. It features a 100 round drum magazine and the weight of the gun makes it very stable when firing from a prone position.

data.name: weapontemplate/41Desc
data.value: By mounting a scope on the bolt-action Kar98k the rifle is converted to a very effective sniper rifle. It is a very precise weapon that holds 5 rounds in the internal magazine.

data.name: weapontemplate/43Desc
data.value: The standard German infantry rifle. Hard-hitting and very precise, but rather low rate of fire due to the bolt-action operation.

data.name: weapontemplate/148Desc
data.value: The standard German light machine gun during the interwar years and into the beginning of the war. The name MG13 deceives the allies into believing it to be from WW1. This is an excellent piece of machinery, it features select-fire and an easy to use bi-pod.

data.name: weapontemplate/1Desc
data.value: The American Soldier's trusty sidekick. Good for cutting things open and poking holes in enemies. Silent and deadly, but you need to get really close to use it.

data.name: weapontemplate/84Desc
data.value: The Hafthohlladung H3.5 (also known as the 'Panzerknacker') is a magnetic shaped charge anti-tank grenade used by the German anti-tank soldiers. It requires a brave soldier willing to run up and place it on an enemy tank.

data.name: weapontemplate/149Desc
data.value: A sturdy and fine crafted wooden bat made for America’s favorite pastime. A great piece of equipment for killing time as well as enemies. The long reach makes it an excellent weapon for close combat.

data.name: weapontemplate/44Desc
data.value: The G43 is a hard-hitting semi-automatic rifle with a 10 round magazine for fast and easy reloads.

data.name: weapontemplate/33Desc
data.value: The PPSh-41 is a Soviet submachine gun. It uses the standard 7.62x25mm Tokarev pistol ammunition. A high rate of fire combined with a very large magazine gives it an impressive amount of firepower, but takes a very experienced soldier to control.

data.name: weapontemplate/34Desc
data.value: The PTRD is a Soviet anti-tank rifle. It is a single shot, bolt-action rifle, firing the massive 14.5x114mm round. While not very effective against heavy armor, it is very effective against lightly armored vehicles and you can carry more ammunition.

data.name: weapontemplate/150Desc
data.value: A wooden bat used in an American sport that was demonstrated in the 1936 summer games. The long reach makes it an excellent weapon for close combat.

data.name: weapontemplate/151Desc
data.value: Played as part of the physical training in the Red Army, Lapta is a traditional Russian bat and ball game. The long reach makes it an excellent weapon for close combat.

data.name: weapontemplate/53Desc
data.value: The Panzerschreck is an Anti-Tank Rocket Launcher. It is fired from the shoulder and is an effective weapon against enemy tanks.

data.name: weapontemplate/102Desc
data.value: The adjustable wrench or ‘monkey wrench’ is a special kind of spanner that can adjust to many sizes of nuts. Ideal for use in the field where tools for mechanical work and self-defense are sparse.

data.name: weapontemplate/47Desc
data.value: The Fallschirmjägergewehr 42 is designed to fill a key niche where you both need a rifle and a light machinegun, but can only carry one. It has a 20 round magazine and is a formidable weapon in the hands of experienced soldiers.

data.name: weapontemplate/49Desc
data.value: The StG44 is a fantastic weapon, the range of a rifle, the firepower of an SMG, and damage in between. With enough of these we can conquer the world! 30 round magazine, great handling and stopping power, makes it a joy to use.

data.name: weapontemplate/54Desc
data.value: The AVS-36 is a Soviet combat rifle capable of both semi-auto and full-auto firing mode. Produced in low numbers because of a complex design it is nevertheless a deadly weapon on the battlefield.

data.name: weapontemplate/138Desc
data.value: This PTRS is the semi-automatic analog of the Soviet PTRD anti-tank rifle. The much faster firing rate makes it an effective weapon against lightly armored vehicles but it comes at the cost of internal mechanics wearing down faster.

data.name: weapontemplate/160Desc
data.value: The Infantry Demolition Kit M1 is a large explosive device. While intended to be used for demolition work, 10 pounds of TNT in a satchel can be quite effective as a weapon when thrown at the enemy.

data.name: weapontemplate/161Desc
data.value: The FP-45 is a .45 caliber single-shot pocket pistol of a very simple design. The grip holds 10 spare rounds. One million pistols were built to be scattered across occupied territories for resistance fighters to find.

data.name: weapontemplate/22Desc
data.value: The TT-33 is a soviet semi-automatic pistol. As with most Russian designs it is simple to manufacture and easy to operate and maintain. It is a formidable weapon, with good penetration and effective range.

data.name: weapontemplate/50Desc
data.value: The M2 Carbine is an updated version of the very popular M1 Carbine. It is capable of fully automatic fire and comes with a 30 round magazine. A stronger stock makes it heavier than the M1, but far better suited for front line conditions.

data.name: weapontemplate/23Desc
data.value: The NR-40 is a Soviet combat knife. It has an inverted guard that curves towards the edge because the knife is usually held with the edge towards yourself. This is most useful if you are trying to sneak up on a enemy from behind.

data.name: weapontemplate/24Desc
data.value: The PPD-40 is an early Soviet submachine gun. It is almost a direct copy of the German MP 28. It fires the 7.62x25mm Tokarev cartridge giving it a controllable recoil and is a useful weapon at close ranges.

data.name: weapontemplate/25Desc
data.value: A sturdy shovel that is very useful for a wide range of jobs, from filling sandbags over digging trenches to using it as a close-combat weapon; splitting heads and bringing hurt to the enemy.

data.name: weapontemplate/63Desc
data.value: The MG34 was at its introduction the most advanced machine gun in the world. It is the standard light machine gun of the German army. Its high rate of fire makes it a dangerous opponent. The MG34 is best fired from a prone position.

data.name: weapontemplate/6Desc
data.value: The MP 34 (or Maschinenpistole 34 as it is also known) is an earlier submachinegun design used by the German army. It fires a 9mm round giving it a controllable recoil and is a useful weapon at close range.

data.name: weapontemplate/5Desc
data.value: The “United States Submachine Gun, Cal. .45, M3”, better known as the “Grease Gun” is a simple design with a rather low rate of fire, but it is still a good thing to have around in your tank or when clearing buildings.

data.name: weapontemplate/56Desc
data.value: The M1A1 carbine is a lightweight, compact and easy-to-use semi-automatic carbine widely used by both paratroopers and tank crew. The folding stock makes it easy to carry in confined spaces.

data.name: weapontemplate/57Desc
data.value: The PPS-43 is a light and compact Soviet submachine gun. It is improving on the older designs with high firing rate, better precision, greater range and better handling. It fires the standard 7.62x25mm Tokarev pistol round.

data.name: weapontemplate/36Desc
data.value: The RPG-43 is a Soviet hand-held anti-tank grenade. It uses a very effective shaped charge HEAT warhead similar to the Panzerfaust. It can penetrate up to 75mm of steel armor making it very dangerous for enemy tank crew.

data.name: weapontemplate/58Desc
data.value: The Nagant M1895 is a Soviet 7-shot, double action revolver with a simple and reliable design. When shooting, a special mechanism pushes the cartridge forward sealing the gas and producing a higher muzzle velocity.

data.name: weapontemplate/7Desc
data.value: The distinctive look and feel of the P08 Parabellum tells of its high precision and superior German craftsmanship. While an old design, it is a very effective weapon, and while very easy to sight, the recoil is the only downside.

data.name: weapontemplate/59Desc
data.value: This ingenious weapon is a thrown anti-tank mine. Stabilizing canvas fins are deployed right after it is thrown. The U.S. Army have found the mine useless in tests but our intelligence reports that they did not understand the correct throwing technique.

data.name: weapontemplate/8Desc
data.value: This six-shot revolver with its double action and swing out cylinder makes it look the part. But looks is not all, it also performs admirably, so if you only need six shots for six enemies this is the revolver for you.

data.name: weapontemplate/66Desc
data.value: The design of this excellent light machine gun shares many similarities with the German FG-42. It is designed to replace the heavy M1918 and is well liked by U.S. troops.

data.name: weapontemplate/67Desc
data.value: Just before the war broke out, the P38 was designed to replace the expensive P08. It marks the pinnacle of german gun design and has been extensively copied by other nations. The gun is very accurate, sturdy and reliable.

data.name: weapontemplate/73Desc
data.value: The first aid kit is a package of bandage carried by the soldier intended for immediate use if he is wounded. The first aid kit can be used to treat the soldiers own wounds as well as his friends.

data.name: weapontemplate/74Desc
data.value: The first aid kit is a package of bandage carried by the soldier intended for immediate use if he is wounded. The first aid kit can be used to treat the soldiers own wounds as well as his friends.

data.name: weapontemplate/75Desc
data.value: The first aid kit is a package of bandage carried by the soldier intended for immediate use if he is wounded. The first aid kit can be used to treat the soldiers own wounds as well as his friends.

data.name: weapontemplate/76Desc
data.value: As the name implies, the M1903 Pocket Hammerless is a compact pocket pistol. Its hammerless design allows it to be easily drawn from a pocket; making it a popular pistol for anyone who wants to carry a bit of extra protection.

data.name: weapontemplate/77Desc
data.value: The Model 1934 is a pocket pistol based on the earlier Model 1914 pistol. What its 7.65mm round lacks in power, the pistol makes up for with its compact size and great ergonomics; making it a popular pistol amongst soldiers.

data.name: weapontemplate/78Desc
data.value: A medic pouch is used by soldiers to carry a small supply of first aid kits intended to help wounded soldiers. The pouch can be resupplied at any medic crate on the battlefield.

data.name: weapontemplate/79Desc
data.value: A medic pouch is used by soldiers to carry a small supply of first aid kits intended to help wounded soldiers. The pouch can be resupplied at any medic crate on the battlefield.

data.name: weapontemplate/9Desc
data.value: The DP 28 is a Soviet light machine gun. It uses a very distinctive 47-round disc shaped magazine which earned it the nickname ‘The Russian record player’. It has a rate of fire similar to the US M1919 Browning.

data.name: weapontemplate/89Desc
data.value: A medic pouch is used by soldiers to carry a small supply of first aid kits intended to help wounded soldiers. The pouch can be resupplied at any medic crate on the battlefield.

data.name: weapontemplate/90Desc
data.value: The Korovin TK is a small pocket pistol. While its small 6.35mm round was considered rather weak, its simple design made the pistol very reliable and its small size allowed it to slip into any pocket.

data.name: weapontemplate/900Desc
data.value: The M2 is a man-portable flamethrower. The design is a huge improvement over the older M1 flamethrower and it is unmatched in reliability. It uses a 5 shot ignition cartridge to ignite the fuel.

data.name: weapontemplate/901Desc
data.value: The Flammenwerfer 41 is a man-portable flamethrower. It is using an improved ignition system that holds 10 ignition cartridges to ignite the fuel, increasing the reliability of the flamethrower compared to previous designs.

data.name: weapontemplate/902Desc
data.value: The ROKS-3 is a man-portable flamethrower. It is designed to resemble a rifle so as to not draw attention to the operator. It contains 10 ignition cartridges in a revolver cylinder near the muzzle to ignite the fuel.

data.name: weapontemplate/903Desc
data.value: The Einstossflammenwerfer 46 is a man-portable single-use flamethrower.

data.name: weapontemplate/98Desc
data.value: The Dienstglas or Doppelglas is issued to officers, NCOs, artillery spotters and aircraft spotters. The standard issue binoculars is 6x30 and is made by a number of well known optics manufacturers.

data.name: weapontemplate/99Desc
data.value: The M3 are the standard U.S. Army binoculars. Although there are many small bubbles in the prisms, the optical quality is decent. However, the high mechanical build quality and robust design makes it great for combat use.

data.name: weapontemplate/48Desc
data.value: The N-K 6x30 are American designed binoculars used by the Red Army. Although there are many small bubbles in the prisms, the optical quality is decent. However, the high mechanical build quality and robust design makes it great for combat use.

data.name: weapontemplate/weaponvarianttype/0Desc
data.value: Seasoned soldiers will personalize their favorite weapon whenever an opportunity arises. That may be a bucket of paint from the garage, or a custom buttstock made of fine wood sent by a friend back home.

data.name: Windows/AssaultTeamDetailsWindow/capital_label
data.value: Choose major city to deploy from:

data.value: (Resources not included in the upgrade price)

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_buy
data.value: Don’t wait - buy now to immediately receive all rewards from Tier 1 plus the rewards for any additional levels you have completed up to this point.

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_buy_unlock
data.value: Unlocking previous seasons allows you to continue your progress after the season ends. You can get rewards for any additional levels you complete while actively following this season.

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_activate
data.value: By clicking the “Activate” button you will set this season as the currently active.

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_howto
data.value: You earn points on the Battle Pass by capturing and defending objectives, killing enemies, destroying enemy vehicles and winning battles in the FPS portion of the game.

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_intro
data.value: The Heroes & Generals WWII Battle Pass allows you to earn rewards by racking up points in the game. Each season offers 12 tiers worth of unique rewards.

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_season_done
data.value: Season {0} has ended.\nThe next season will begin soon.

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_confirmation_unlock
data.value: This season will now unlock and become active. You can switch to any unlocked season or the current one using the “Activate” button at any time.

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_confirmation_activate
data.value: You are about to change the active season to:\n<highlight>Season {0}</highlight>\n If you accept, your future Player Score will contribute to that season for as long as it is active. Are you sure about this?

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/desc_buy_short
data.value: Buy Battle Pass to claim your rewards!

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/rewards/uniformvariant
data.value: Exclusive season themed uniform variant for

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/rewards/camo_netting_tank_destroyer
data.value: Camouflage netting for medium tank destroyers

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/rewards/weaponvariant
data.value: Exclusive season themed weapon paint job for:

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/rewards/smoke_trails
data.value: Exclusive smoke trail color for fighter planes

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/rewards/heads_camo
data.value: Exclusive facial camouflage (for all soldier appearances)

data.name: Windows/BattlePassWindow/rewards/vehicle_skins
data.value: Exclusive season themed vehicle paint job for:

data.name: Windows/BoosterSelection/window_desc
data.value: You currently own several boosters of the same type. Please select the one you would like to activate.

data.name: Windows/BoosterShopWindow/activation_help_at_speed_booster
data.value: The booster can be activated from the info box by selecting an Assault Team on the Soldier Screen. It is active until the time runs out.

data.name: Windows/BoosterShopWindow/activation_help_rank_xp_booster
data.value: The booster is activated from the Soldier screen and is active until the time runs out.

data.name: Windows/BoosterShopWindow/explanation_rank_xp_booster
data.value: Rank XP Boosters will accelerate the progress on all your soldiers during combat. Veteran members will receive the boost on top of the boost from the membership.

data.name: Windows/BoosterShopWindow/activation_help_ribbon_booster
data.value: The booster is activated from the Ribbon Overview Window and is active until the time runs out.

data.name: Windows/BoosterShopWindow/explanation_ribbon_booster
data.value: Ribbon Boosters will accelerate the progress on all your soldiers during combat. Veteran members will receive the boost on top of the boost from the membership.

data.name: Windows/BoosterShopWindow/explanation_at_speed_booster
data.value: Speed boosters make your Assault Teams move faster across the war map. \nGetting your teams to a battle quickly when your faction is low on resources is crucial and can help turn impending defeat into victory.

data.name: Windows/ChangeToGeneralConfirmationWindow/inputRequired
data.value: Are you sure you want to promote your current soldier to a general? Please confirm by typing 'I accept' below

data.name: Windows/ChangeToGeneralConfirmationWindow/warningThree
data.value: NOTE: All weapons, vehicles and uniforms will be transferred to your 'Equipment Depot'. Your other soldiers can equip them from there. Captured weapons, however, will ONLY be available to soldiers of the same faction that the weapons were captured from.

data.name: Windows/ChangeToGeneralConfirmationWindow/warningTwo
data.value: you will not be able to go back to your previous career after you accept this.

data.name: Windows/ChangeToGeneralConfirmationWindow/warningOne
data.value: WARNING: This is a permanent choice.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/001Description
data.value: The Assault infantry specializes in attacking and capturing enemy positions. Medium ranged weapons and fast vehicles are selected to put maximum pressure on a defending enemy.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/tooltip_top_soldier
data.value: Top soldier: %s \n Click to see specialization progression.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/004Description
data.value: The Anti-Tank Infantry specializes in destroying armored vehicles using hand-held weapons.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/002Description
data.value: The Close Quarters Expert specializes in combat at short ranges, usually inside buildings and other areas where you are expected to get close to the enemy. Weapons and equipment are selected to produce maximum damage, fast and without much precision.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/005Description
data.value: The medic plays a very important support role on the battlefield by healing wounded soldiers. He carries a large number of medical supplies in favor of heavy weapons.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/015Description
data.value: The role of the Tank Hunter is to hunt down and destroy enemy tanks using tanks and ammunition designed specifically for this task. Some tank hunter tanks have removed the turret in favor of a larger gun. Others have thinner armor to enable faster movement.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/018Description
data.value: The Recon Sniper specializes in killing enemies at long ranges. High powered sniper rifles are used in combination with camouflage techniques.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/023Description
data.value: Close Air Support is a favorite of the ground troops. Hunting and killing strong enemy ground units like tanks and armored vehicles can really make a difference.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/022Description
data.value: The Air Force Commander is controlling the aircraft units of the air force, moving fighters to combat zones to aid the ground troops or destroy enemy aircraft.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/021Description
data.value: The Fighter Ace is put in this world to hunt and destroy enemy aircraft - mainly other fighters.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/020Description
data.value: The Recon Commander is at the tip of the advancing force. The troops under his command have high vision range and can spot enemy movements to the benefit of the general army.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/017Description
data.value: The Armor Commander controls the armor units in the war. By moving tanks to the soft spots on the enemy frontline, he can stage breakouts that can lead to the capture of large chunks of enemy territory.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/013Description
data.value: The Armored Spearhead consists of fast, light tanks used to overwhelm the enemy infantry positions either by flanking or simply suppression that allows infantry to advance. The Armored Spearhead is vulnerable to heavier armor, though.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/012Description
data.value: The Airborne Commander controls the airborne troops and decides where to insert them to cause maximum disruption by blocking supply lines to starve the enemy of fresh reinforcements to ongoing battles.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/009Description
data.value: The airborne raider is trained to drop directly into capture zones and wipe out enemies using high rate of fire weapons at close range.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/008Description
data.value: The Infantry Commander controls the backbone of the battlefield: The grunts on the frontline.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/description_specialization
data.value: Each specialization requires you to earn XP on specific ribbons, ranks or assault teams in order to receive rewards and earn a star. The total amount of XP needed to complete a specialization is a combination of XP earned on these specific ribbons, ranks and assault teams.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/tooltip_earn_ribbon_points
data.value: %s \n Earn XP on this ribbon to unlock the item. Click to see full ribbon progression.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/tooltip_rank_no_soldier
data.value: You need to own a soldier of the %s class to see his rank progression.

data.name: Windows/CharacterCareer/tooltip_ribbon_no_soldier
data.value: You need to own a soldier of the %s class to see his ribbon progression.

data.name: Windows/CharacterLimit/description_character_limit
data.value:
You are able to keep up to 30 soldiers on active duty per faction.
 Soldiers on active duty are the ones that you can switch between while in battle.
 You currently have {0} {1} soldiers on active duty (Generals do not count). This means you will no longer be able to bring all of them into battle and which ones will be available will be selected at random for every battle.
 In order to guarantee availability of your roster, please send {2} {3} soldiers on leave.

data.name: Windows/ModifyWeaponWindow/ToolTips/DamageTooltip
data.value:
DAMAGE
Increased damage will make the weapon more deadly to your enemies. Damage is dependent on range, with more damage with the target close and less with distance.

data.name: Windows/ModifyWeaponWindow/ToolTips/PrecisionTooltip
data.value:
PRECISION
Increased precision will make the shots land closer to where you aim. The weapon has to be in complete rest in order to get the full benefit of increased precision.

data.name: Windows/ModifyWeaponWindow/ToolTips/StabilityTooltip
data.value:
STABILITY
Increased stability will make the weapon regain precision quicker after firing.

data.name: Windows/ModifyWeaponWindow/ToolTips/RateoffireTooltip
data.value:
RATE OF FIRE
Increased rate of fire will make the weapon shoot faster but often at the expense of decreased precision or stability.

data.name: Windows/ModifyWeaponWindow/ToolTips/RangeTooltip
data.value:
RANGE
Increased range will enable you to hit targets that are further away. Because the damage works with range you will also get increased damage on distanced targets.
